alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Roosevelt County; South Central Highlands; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 1:41PM MST until January 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Highlands, Upper Tularosa Valley, Roosevelt County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust are possible across southern Chaves County Thursday afternoon and may reduce visibility to 3 miles or less at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Roosevelt County; South Central Highlands; Upper Tularosa Valley
